results.title: The effect of metformin on vertebral marrow fat in postmenopausal women with newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To determine the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Marrow_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001855 @@@marrow adiposity@@@ in postmenopausal @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with newly diagnosed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@).

results.title: Metformin ameliorates ionizing irradiation-induced long-term hematopoietic stem cell injury in mice
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has the potential to be used as a novel radioprotectant to ameliorate TBI-induced long-term @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Marrow_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001855 @@@BM injury@@@.
